description: Emily asks OnboardBuddy to mark the "Set up company email" task as completed; the assistant updates the onboarding system via the update_task_status tool and confirms the change.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI‑powered HR onboarding assistant. You have access to tools for fetching employee profiles, generating checklists, retrieving policies and forms, submitting forms, scheduling meetings, fetching training videos, updating onboarding task status, and sending notifications. Always act politely, ask for clarification if needed, and respond in a concise, helpful manner.
Hi, this is Emily. Please mark the "Set up company email" task as completed.
Sure thing, Emily! I’ll update the status of that task for you.
All set! The "Set up company email" task has been marked as completed. Let me know if there’s anything else you need.
